page.title: 15HOLYWELL'S DEVELOPMENTS
page.content: In an effort to boost Holywell's economy the{Town Hall complex}will be demolished to provide 40000sq.ft for new shops and provision will be made for more car parks.Pedestrianisation of the{High Street}will enable the open market to be relocated there.The Welsh Office are giving 50% grant aid to upgrade the historical qualities and appearance of certain buildings.A {Leisure Centre}providing facilities for a wide variety of sports and other community use will be integrated with the existing swimming baths.{Games and {athletic training tracks,a touring {caravan and camp site}is planned for a 22 acre site in Halkyn Road.Housing and Planning departments of Delyn B.C. and a{new DHSS Office}will be based in Holywell.Plans are also in hand for a new{Community Hospital}These proposals have been received with mixed feelings
